mapper.select: /*Cm0101Dao.SelectAllList[게시판리스트조회]*/ SELECT ROWNUM AS ID , IDX , PARENT_IDX , TITLE , CONTENTS , UPD_DT FROM TB_BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE #{title}||'%' AND CONTENTS LIKE #{contens}||'%' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(IDX) DESC
/*Cm0101Dao.selectOne [게시판 단일조회]*/ SELECT IDX , PARENT_IDX , TITLE , CONTENTS , UPD_DT FROM TB_BOARD WHERE IDX = #{idx}

/*Cm0101Dao.selectMenuList[게시판리스트조회]*/ SELECT LPAD(' ', 2*(LEVEL-1)) || MENU_NM MENU_NMS ,(LEVEL-1) AS LEVELS , A.MENU_ID , A.SYS_SE_CD , A.UP_MENU_ID , A.MENU_NM , A.MENU_SEQ , A.MENU_EXPLN , A.MENU_LVL , A.PRGRM_ID , A.PRGRM_PATH , A.URL_ADDR , A.USE_YN FROM CM_MENU_B A WHERE A.USE_YN='Y' AND (A.UP_MENU_ID = #{upMenuId} OR A.UP_MENU_ID IN (SELECT B.MENU_ID FROM CM_MENU_BSC_B B WHERE B.UP_MENU_ID = #{upMenuId}) ) AND A.MENU_LVL > 0 START WITH A.UP_MENU_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_ID = A.UP_MENU_ID
